pageProduct.name: Off! Tropical Strength Insect Repellent Pump 175g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

"Off! Tropical Strength Insect Repellent Spray offers dermatologically tested protection for up to 8 hours from mosquitos & other biting bugs.

Using Picaridin, Off! is ideal for everyday outdoor use for the family*, as well as for travelers.

Off! Tropical Strength Insect Repellent Pump Spray 175mL is a non-greasy & lightly fragranced that offers lasting protection. Better yet, Dermatologically tested for an effective & gentle repellent. 

Suitable for everyday use; get up to 8 hours long lasting protection against flying pests & bugs including mosquitoes, flies, sand flies, ticks & other biting insects.

For a handy Aerosol version, try Off! Aerosol bug spray which is easily applied no matter the occasion. 

Our goal is to help protect your time outside. Whether you're working up a sweat or just soaking in the sun, Off! can help you enjoy the outdoors instead of worrying about mosquitoes & bugs.

Make the most of your time outside with Off! Make the most of your time outside with Off!

Suitable For: Backyard, Beach, Gardening, Playground, Relaxing

Product Claims: Repels up to 8 hours

Size: 175mL

Fragrance: Tropical

KEY FEATURES

• Tropical Strength Repellent Spray
• Insect Protection for up to 8 Hours
• Dermatologically Tested on Sensitive Skin
• Non-Greasy Formula
• Lightly Fragranced

Warnings

Not to be used for any purpose, or in any manner, contrary to this label unless authorised under appropriate legislation.

Not to be applied to infants under 12 months of age unless on doctor's advice.

PRECAUTIONS

Keep out of reach children. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. Do not spray directly on exposed foods or food utensils. Do not store or use near fire or flame.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

If poisoning occurs, contact a doctor or Poisons Information Centre. Phone Australia 13 11 26, New Zealand 0800 764 766.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: 191g/L Picaridin

Directions

Hold bottle upright & lightly spray all exposed skin in a slow sweeping motion from a distance of 15-20 cm. Do not spray towards eyes or mouth. To apply to face, firstly spray on hands & rub on. Reapply as necessary in cases of excessive perspiration.

USAGE ADVICE

WARNING: NOT TO BE APPLIED TO INFANTS UNDER 12 MONTHS OF AGE UNLESS ON DOCTORS ADVICE. AVOID CONTACT WITH THE EYES. WILL CAUSE EYE IRRITATION.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Will irritate the eyes. Avoid contact with the eyes.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Store in the closed original container in a cool dry place, out of reach of children. Do not store in direct sunlight. Dispose of empty container by wrapping in paper, placing in plastic bag and putting in garbage.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in the closed original container in a cool dry place, out of the reach of children. Do not store in direct sunlight.

Storage Temperature: Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C.
